titleStmt.title: England's golden watch-bell. Summoning an alarum to death and judgement Licensed according to order.
England's golden watch-bell. Summoning an alarum to death and judgement Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Thackeray at the Angel in Duck-lane near West-smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and range of suggested imprint dates from Wing.

With an additional title page with the same imprint, which reads: England's golden watch-bell. Summoning an alarum to death and judgement. Or, an exhortation set forth in these times, that every poor sinner, by turning from his sins, may lay hold of this the acceptable day of grace and salvation, to the endless comfort of his precious and immortal soul.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
